desc.en: According to the "Environmental Impact Report for the Urban Rail Transit Network Plan of Chongqing Central Urban Area (2021-2035) (Draft for Soliciting Opinions)", the route and stations of the lines that have not yet started construction are for reference only.
desc.zh-Hans: 根据《重庆市中心城区城市轨道交通网线规划（2021-2035年）环境影响报告书（征求意见稿）》绘制，未开工线路走向及站点仅供参考。

updateHistory.reason: Remove redundant node in the top left corner.
将暂未开通的5号线中段与10号线后段取消，更新谢家湾站内换乘与谢家湾、观音桥错误站名
Added rivers announced lines 5 10 rear passes  line 18 line logos and line colors  changed style
Change Color and Huangjueping station name
Fix alignment around Houbao North Station and Bijin while correcting spelling of system.
Update opening status of several stations entering service from October to November 2023.
Change name of Lijiatuo Daqiao Chongqing University of Technology and Huaxi Industrial Park
Revise some substantive errors and modify the relative positions of some stations and lines.
New template of Chongqing 20241226 with new operaton of Bitong Line today
Use master node to make thumbnail page in gallery looks better. Revise styles of Line 9 and etc.
The new version is a forward-looking plan.
